title: Pickâ€™em Icon
body: Its been 2 weeks since i got enough points for the second icon, but i have still not received it yet. Anyone here interested to explain why?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received your icons within 3 days after the end of the event (Quoted below)

>If you are eligible for these icons, you should get them no later than three (3) days after the event ends on October 30th. If you have not received these icons after three (3) days, please contact player support.

You should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.
Me too, i haven't got my second icon as well!!
